isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9300, AND 9400 - ADJUSTMENTS - REAR HOOD GUIDE

svcsubproc.title: 9300 and 9400 (After June 1994) - Rear Hood Guide Adjustment Up or Down
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 92 for all Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.
To adjust the hood up or down (Item 7) at the rear hood guide (Item 2) to align the top of the hood with the top of the cowl, use the following procedure.

step1.para: Release the hood latches on each side of the hood and tilt the hood assembly enough to adjust the rear hood guide (Item 2).

Loosen, but do not remove, the adjustment bolts (Item 1) that secure the rear hood guide (Item 2) to the inside of the hood. Adjust the rear hood guide up or down (Item 7) on the slotted holes to raise or lower the hood, as required.
Hold the rear hood guide (Item 2) in place and tighten adjustment bolts (Item 1).
Repeat this procedure for the other side.
Lower the hood to the closed position and latch the hood on each side. Check to see that the top of the hood is the same height as the cowl.
If further adjustment is required, repeat this procedure.

calloutgroup.callout1: 7. ADJUST IN DIRECTION OF ARROWS UP OR DOWN
